transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .root-page{align-items:center;animation:breathing 1s ease 0s infinite alternate;background-color:#0d7ae1;border-radius:100px;bottom:65px;cursor:pointer;display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:40px;justify-content:flex-start;max-width:50px;outline:2px solid hsla(0,0%,100%,.55);overflow:hidden;padding:8px 0;position:fixed;right:7px;width:40px;z-index:9999}@keyframes breathing{0%{box-shadow:0 0 5px 2px rgba(2,70,255,.2)}to{box-shadow:0 0 7px 3px rgba(2,70,255,.8)}}@keyframes breathing-deep{0%{box-shadow:0 0 5px 2px rgba(2,70,255,.3)}to{box-shadow:0 0 10px 6px rgba(2,70,255,.8)}}.root-page>img{-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:25px}.root-page>p{color:#fff;font-size:11px;text-align:center;width:30%}.customer{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:50px;justify-content:center;overflow:hidden;width:50px}.customer>img{border-radius:100px;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:42px}.card-container{align-items:flex-start;background-color:transparent;border-radius:10px;bottom:35px;cursor:pointer;display:flex;flex-direction:row;height:221px;justify-content:space-between;opacity:0;overflow:hidden;position:fixed;right:15px;transform:translateX(320px);transition:height .2s ease,width .5s ease,transform 0s ease,opacity .6s ease;width:240px;z-index:9999}.hoverCard{opacity:1;transform:translateX(-25px);transition:transform .5s ease}.card{align-items:center;background-color:#fff;border-radius:10px;box-shadow:0 0 5px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.2);display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:220px;justify-content:center;width:220px;z-index:9999}.noshow-card{height:100px;opacity:0;width:10px}.card>h1{color:rgba(0,0,0,.65);font-size:13px}.chat-windows{align-items:center;background-color:#fff;border-radius:5px;bottom:20px;box-shadow:0 8px 8px hsla(0,0%,39%,.5);display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:0;opacity:0;overflow:hidden;position:fixed;right:45px;transition:all .3s ease;width:400px;z-index:9999}.windows-header{background-image:url(https://tentech.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/custom/20231019162909.png);background-size:cover;height:70px;justify-content:space-between;position:sticky;top:0;width:100%;z-index:3}.chat-logo-container,.windows-header{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:row}.chat-logo-container{justify-content:flex-start;padding-left:20px}.chat-logo-container>img{border-radius:1000px;margin-right:6px;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:50px}.chat-logo-container>p{color:#fff}.welcome{align-items:flex-start;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:flex-start;padding-top:10px}.welcome>h1{color:#fff;font-size:16px}.welcome>p{color:#fff;font-size:12px;font-weight:100}.show-chat-windows{height:560px;opacity:1}.close-line{background-color:#fff;height:3px;width:20px}.close-button{align-items:center;cursor:pointer;display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:40px;justify-content:center;margin-right:20px;width:40px}.chat-message-container{background-color:#f3f3f3;height:60%;overflow:hidden;overflow-y:auto;z-index:2}.chat-message-container,.message-send-container{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;width:100%}.message-send-container{background-color:#fff;border-top:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.15);height:calc(40% - 60px)}.service-level-container{height:40px;justify-content:flex-end;width:100%}.human-service,.service-level-container{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:row}.human-service{cursor:pointer;justify-content:flex-start;margin-right:20px}.human-service>img{margin-right:6px;width:20px}.human-service>a{color:#005abc;font-size:12px}.message-container{min-height:50px;width:100%}.message-input{color:#000;font-size:16px;font-style:normal;font-weight:700;padding:0 10px;resize:none;white-space:pre-wrap;width:100%}.message-input,.message-input:focus{border:none;outline:none}.send-message-button-container{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:flex-end;padding:0 20px;width:100%}.send-message-button{background-color:#fff;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.25);border-radius:5px;color:rgba(0,0,0,.55);cursor:pointer;font-size:14px;padding:4px 18px}.message-item{justify-content:flex-start;padding:8px}.message-item,.user-message-content{display:flex;flex-direction:row;width:100%}.user-message-content{align-items:flex-start;overflow:hidden}.user-message{justify-content:flex-end}.user-message>img{border-radius:5000px;height:30px;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:30px}.service-message{justify-content:flex-start}.service-message>img{border-radius:5000px;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:30px}.no-user-message-item{background-color:#fff;border-radius:5px;color:#000;font-size:14px;margin-left:5px;overflow:hidden;padding:5px}.no-user-message-item>p>img{max-height:200px;max-width:200px}.user-message-item{background-color:#38a1df;border-radius:5px;color:#fff;font-size:14px;margin-right:5px;padding:5px}.card-item{height:32%;width:100%}.card-line{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.2);height:2px;width:90%}.call-phone{align-items:flex-start;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:flex-start;padding:10px}.call-phone>img{margin-right:8px;width:20px}.phone-number{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.phone-number>p{color:#000;font-size:16px}.phone-number>h1{color:#0d7ae1;font-size:18px}.contact{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:flex-start;padding:10px}.contact>img{margin-right:8px;width:20px}.contact>p{color:#000;font-size:16px;margin-right:8px}.contact-button{background-color:#004e98;color:#fff;font-size:14px;padding:6px 12px}.more-contact{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:center}.more-contact>img{width:14px}.more-contact>p{font-size:16px;margin-right:8px}.hot-question{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;min-height:100px;width:100%}.hot-question-container{background-color:#fff;border-radius:10px;height:100%;padding:10px 20px;width:100%}.available{background-color:#0060e7;border:1px solid transparent;color:#fff}@media screen and (max-width:1023px){.chat-windows{right:16px}}@media screen and (max-width:480px){.customer>img{width:40px}.customer,.root-page{height:40px;width:40px}.hoverCard{height:52px;opacity:1;transform:translateX(-40px);width:240px}.card>h1{font-size:12px}.chat-windows{margin:0 16px;right:0;width:100%}}
